howItWorks.Its the easiest way to buy sell: Buy or rent your suitable property for free
howItWorks.properties: Simple and accurate steps that will bring you closer to your goals
howItWorks.matched property: al.aaqar offers you enhanced property search experience what ever text search, variables based search or al.aaqar unique AI search engine that takes you in easy and simple steps to tailor your needs to get your perfect property
howItWorks.looking for exactly: With your choice of any of the previous methods, you will get the units resulting from your search, and one of our real estate consultants will contact you to provide you with the best suggestions without any charges.
howItWorks.visits attended by: Our real estate consultant will organize appointments, help you make a decision, and discuss with you the best available options matching your needs.

home.share_your_quests_description: 'al.aaqar' search engine designed with AI that takes you in easy and simple steps to determine your needs accurately, and this is the most accurate and effective way to get your perfect property.

setPriorities.Set Priorities: Set priorities by al.aaqar electronic advisor
setPriorities.Description: Simple steps designed professionally and carefully by real estate experts ensure that you enjoy a unique experience in searching for your suitable property, bring you closer to your dreams, and put in front of you the best options for the property you are looking for with ease and accuracy, and the results will be shown to you with a percentage of the appropriate percentage for your choices.
setPriorities.Hint 1: SELECT YOUR GEOGRAPHICAL LOCATION AND PROPERTY TYPE
setPriorities.Hint 2: IN 3 CONSECUTIVE STEPS, SET YOUR PRIORITIES
setPriorities.choose compound: To search for a compound, click here!
setPriorities.select compound: To select a compound, click here!
setPriorities.Set your priorities and drag and drop th: Set your priorities and drag and drop them from left to right
setPriorities.Select High priority: Select your High priority options and click on the Done button to move to the following priority
setPriorities.Select Medium priority: Select your Medium priority options and click on the Done button to move to the following priority
setPriorities.Select Low priority: Select your Low priority options and click on the Done button to set your priorities

advisor.title: Electronic Advisor
advisor.description: Simple steps designed by real estate experts to ensure getting your suitable property, and the results will be shown to you with a relevance score. This journey will take around 4-7 min.
advisor.journey: The journey will be in 3 consecutive steps, based on the importance of your priorities.
advisor.priority_description: In the following steps, you will prioritise your property search in two phases based on importance, with the first stage regarded as most important and the second stage being the least important.
advisor.choose_top_priority: Choose your top priorities in selecting a property from the list below.
advisor.choose_low_priority: Choose your low priorities in selecting a property from the list below.

no_visits: Visits you've completed with our consultants will appear here.
list_properties: List your properties and add their specs to view them here
solution_text: al.aaqar is the first search engine supported by AI, to find the best options that suit your needs, which saves you a lot of time, effort, and search trouble, as well as a lot of real estate brokers' money, Also If you are a property owner, al.aaqar provides you with the right consumer, which facilitates the sale process and saves time and effort.
advisor_description3: by easy and simple steps you will get your perfect property
advisor_description: 'Al-AQAR' search engine created with Artificial Intelligence that guides you through easy and simple steps to precisely determine your demands, and this is the most accurate and effective approach to find your perfect property.
